summary: REQ-7/REQ-8 appear implemented: backend user profile now includes a persisted role, onboarding modal requires role selection and shows the specified student warning, and frontend adds role-based routing/nav with an access-denied screen. Student Portal and local doubt-solver components are added, but due to truncation itâ€™s not fully verifiable that all required UI entry points and per-question result details are displayed exactly as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: On submit, the UI shows total score and per-question feedback (selected option, correct option).
missing_requirements.reason: A ResultsSummary component is added and appears to compute score and correctness, but the diff is truncated before showing the per-question review contents (selected option vs correct option) in the UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each question in the Student Portal has a "Ask Doubt" / "Doubt Solver" UI entry point.
missing_requirements.reason: A DoubtSolverPanel component exists and PracticeSession imports it, but PracticeSession is truncated before showing the actual per-question entry point/button and interaction that exposes it for each question.
